prompts.name: Sales Forecasting Model
prompts.description: This template enables the creation of a sales forecasting model. Replace {{historical sales data}} with past sales that will be considered, {{market trends}} with industry or economic factors considered, {{sales strategies}} with your planned sales initiatives, and {{forecast periods}} with your forecasted timeline.
prompts.content: Construct a sales forecasting model featuring {{historical sales data}}, current {{market trends}}, upcoming {{sales strategies}}, and set {{forecast periods}}. Be careful not to include any confidential client information or unapproved future strategies.

prompts.name: Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Plan
prompts.description: This template assists in drawing up a CRM plan. Substitute {{strategy objectives}} with your CRM targets, {{client segmentation}} with your customer breakdown, {{follow-up actions}} with customer interaction planning, and {{measurement metrics}} with your CRM performance indicators.
prompts.content: Develop a CRM plan laying out your {{strategy objectives}}, undertakes significant {{client segmentation}}, arranges diligent {{follow-up actions}}, and applies measurable {{measurement metrics}}. Avoid discussing sensitive customer data or proprietary CRM tools.

prompts.name: New Product Sales Strategy
prompts.description: Use this blueprint to construct a new product sales strategy. Replace {{product USPs}} with unique selling points of the product, {{target audience}} with your defined customer segment, {{sales channels}} with your proposed distribution channels, and {{promotion plans}} with marketing and advertising efforts for the product.
prompts.content: Script a new product sales strategy underscoring {{product USPs}}, identifying the {{target audience}}, stating practical {{sales channels}}, and outlining creative {{promotion plans}}. Please, avoid releasing any confidential product features or unconfirmed marketing strategies.

prompts.name: Sales Team Training Plan
prompts.description: This structure enables a wholesome sales team training plan. Substitute {{training goals}} with what you intend the team to learn, {{training content}} with the specifics of the training curriculum, {{training schedule}} with times for training sessions, and {{evaluation methods}} with plans for assessing the training's effectiveness.
prompts.content: Formulate a sales team training plan specifying your {{training goals}}, delivering a broad-based {{training content}}, providing a flexible yet structured {{training schedule}}, and utilising reliable {{evaluation methods}}. Refrain from pointing out individual weaknesses or confidential sales strategies.

prompts.name: Key Account Management Strategy
prompts.description: This template assists in assembling a key account management strategy. Replace {{account selection criteria}} with your rules for identifying key accounts, {{relationship building strategies}} with techniques for nurturing customer relationships, {{account growth plans}} with initiatives on expanding business with each account, and {{success metrics}} with indicators for tracking the strategy's performance.
prompts.content: Sketch a key account management strategy highlighting transparent {{account selection criteria}}, relationship-enhancing {{relationship building strategies}}, optimised {{account growth plans}}, and realistic {{success metrics}}. Avoid commenting on specific accounts or revealing sensitive pricing strategies.

prompts.name: Sales Quota Setting Method
prompts.description: This template assists in devising a sales quota setting method. Substitute {{sales performance history}} with past sales records, {{market analysis}} with consideration of market conditions, {{sales capacity}} with your team's sales potential, and {{quota adjustment guidelines}} with the rules for quota revisions.
prompts.content: Draw up a sales quota setting method featuring a review of {{sales performance history}}, systematic {{market analysis}}, accurate {{sales capacity}} estimation, and clear-cut {{quota adjustment guidelines}}. Avoid discussing individual salesperson's performance or confidential revenue information.

prompts.name: Customer Retention Strategy
prompts.description: This template aids in structuring a customer retention strategy. Replace {{retention goals}} with your objectives for maintaining customers, {{customer segmentation}} with specific customer groups, {{engagement tactics}} with methods to hold customer interest, and {{evaluation metrics}} with your methods of assessing retention success.
prompts.content: Develop a customer retention strategy tailoring to {{retention goals}}, segmenting {{customer segmentation}}, planning interactive {{engagement tactics}}, and adopting real-time {{evaluation metrics}}. Refrain from including specific customer experiences or any data that violates customer privacy.

prompts.name: Competitor Pricing Analysis
prompts.description: Use this blueprint to conduct a competitor pricing analysis. Substitute {{competitor identification}} with the process in place to identify competitors, {{pricing data}} with details on your competitors' pricing, {{benefit comparison}} with a comparison of your products' values against competitors, and {{pricing strategy recommendations}} with advised pricing moves based on the analysis.
prompts.content: Perform a competitor pricing analysis that includes essential {{competitor identification}}, comprehensive {{pricing data}}, benefit-focused {{benefit comparison}}, along with {{pricing strategy recommendations}}. Avoid sharing confidential information or any analytical methods that give your organisation a proprietary edge.

prompts.name: Lead Generation Initiative
prompts.description: This schema enables a lead generation initiative. Replace {{lead generation channels}} with your sources for finding potential customers, {{lead scoring criteria}} with your system for ranking the value of leads, {{follow-up methods}} with how you'll connect with leads, and {{performance evaluation}} with your method for assessing the lead generation success.
prompts.content: Construct a lead generation initiative outlining our preferred {{lead generation channels}}, establishing defined {{lead scoring criteria}}, designing efficient {{follow-up methods}}, and implementing a comprehensive {{performance evaluation}} plan. Be cautious about revealing proprietary marketing strategies or specific leads data.

prompts.name: Sales Incentive Scheme
prompts.description: This structure crafts a sale incentive scheme. Substitute {{sales performance metrics}} with your standards for evaluating sales performance, {{reward types}} with your offerings for exceptional performance, {{eligibility criteria}} with the rules on who can participate, and {{scheme duration}} with the timeline for the scheme.
prompts.content: Form an attractive sales incentive scheme incorporating transparent {{sales performance metrics}}, enticing {{reward types}}, clear {{eligibility criteria}}, and a fixed {{scheme duration}}. Avoid mentioning specific reward amounts or performance thresholds that have not been finalised.
